description: Tender notice for one (1) front mower, RFP against Supply Arrangement, Lowest Price, under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
full_summary:
**Front Mower Tender**

* **Reference Number/Numéro de Référence:** cb-484-98693754
* **Solicitation Number/Numéro de Sollicitation:** 01R11-25-046
* **Publication Date/Date de Publication:** 2024-05-29
* **Tender Closing Date/Date de Clôture des Offres:** 2024-06-13T13:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date/Date de Démarrage du Contrat:** 2024-06-17
* **Expected Contract End Date/Date de Fin du Contrat:** 2025-03-31

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites bids for the procurement of a front mower as part of Group 1, Configuration A. 

The requested delivery date for the goods is March 31, 2025. Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B to be eligible to participate in this tender. 

To pre-qualify as a supplier, visit the [Buyandsell.gc.ca website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-75734).

The tender includes essential information about the good or service, vendor qualifications, and terms and conditions of the contract. The selected bidder will be required to provide the front mower with delivery to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada in Alberta, Canada.

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is committed to promoting fair and transparent business practices. The primary criterion for selection is the lowest price.

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within fifteen working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. 

This tender responds to a requirement under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). 

Contact information for this tender is as follows:

* Name: Natalie O’Neill
* Email: natalie.oneill@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (306) 807-8740

Please note that the deadline for the tender is expired and this tender is no longer valid. Applications after this date will not be considered. 

This entry includes the following key elements: 
*   Contract title 
*   Reference number
*   Solicitation number
*   Publication date
*   Tender closing date
*   Expected contract duration
*   Suppliers' requirement
